cms_page.content:

{{widget type="MGS\Mpanel\Block\Widget\ProductList" view_mode="mode_grid" type_list="new" per_row_grid="4" number_show="8"}}

{{block class="MGS\Testimonial\Block\Testimonial" testimonials_count="3" row="1" nav="true" dots="false" autoplay="false" template="slide.phtml"}}

{{widget type="MGS\Blog\Block\Widget\Lastest" number_of_posts="5" show_thumbnail="1" thumbnail_width="240" thumbnail_height="180" show_short_content="1" limit_characters_short_content="200" view_as="owl_carousel" items="3" navigation="1" template="widget/default.phtml"}}
